oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Adams, David, 1829 December 30
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of David Adams, dated December 30th, 1829. Illustrates the first page of the document. Adams’ will was recorded in the Davidson County Court. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Adams family
